attributes.action: address the current sytem for assessment of Working Families Tax Credit
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At present Working Tax Credit (WTC) is assessed on a families earning for the last complete income tax year. In calculating the benefit this working families do not receive the extra help that the need during periods of vastly reduced income (ie Maternity leave), this being when the extra help is needed.
The current system also gives rise to overpayments of Benefit in thousands of cases each year.
